variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a Leucine to Proline change at position 862 of the LRP1 protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 and SH-SY5Y cell lines.

Readout description.Result Description: For the variant NM_001239676.4:c.2585C>T, there was a significant reduction in LRP1 protein levels in both HEK293 and SH-SY5Y cell lines.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each cell line.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRP1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Tukey's multiple comparison test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: LRP1 protein levels greater than 80% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: LRP1 protein levels less than 50% of wild-type levels.
